author: jgm
content: Seeing issues with besu's JSON-RPC response for `eth_getTransactionByHash` for type 4 transactions.  Examples of the output for transaction `0x6158b13bdea8283ba333cdc2beb4b7d8e39b56cbf52eecd502599db8d9fc13a3` on devnet 6 for reth and besu attached. <@&836981603216654336>

author: siladu
content: Thanks. We already merged a fix for this on latest main branch https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/8265
